title: Development project to support the NRA and Nat UXO Lao mine clearance operator Undirect land users
description: Provision of programmatic and technical support since 2017 to the National Regulatory Authority for the UXO/Mine Action Sector (NRA) and the Lao National Unexploded Ordnance Programme (UXO Lao) to pursue the targets set out in the UXO Sector Five Year Work Plan 2016-2020. The project has also supported NRAâ€™s strategy for accelerated survey and clearance, UXO/mine risk education (MRE) and victim assistance (VA) activities,
